Chemical.content:
Please identify the "Chemical" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Chemical". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Bupivacaine antagonizes epinephrine dysrhythmogenicity in conscious dogs susceptible to VT and in anesthetized dogs with spontaneous postinfarct dysrhythmias .

Let's think step by step.

| Chemical |
| --- |
| Bupivacaine |
| Epinephrine |

Bupivacaine is a local anesthetic that antagonizes the dysrhythmogenic effects of epinephrine in conscious dogs susceptible to ventricular tachycardia (VT), as well as in anesthetized dogs with spontaneous post-infarct dysrhythmias.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Chemical" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Chemical".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Chemical |
| --- |
| Bupivacaine |
| Epinephrine |

Bupivacaine antagonizes the dysrhythmogenic effects of epinephrine in dogs: in conscious dogs susceptible to ventricular tachycardia (VT) and in anesthetized dogs with spontaneous post-infarct dysrhythmias.
